item.title: Dumped trailor, 1st October
item.description:
Trailer has been parked up in plum lane for just over 1 month, it appeared late at night and no one has been near to check it or move it. The trailer has no number plate and is taking up parking spaces for residents and school traffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rowton Road, Shooters Hill, London

item.title: Bins not collect on whole of Clapton terrace, 1st October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London

item.title: Road hump required, 1st October
item.description:
On Rosecroft Avenue the road bends to the right leading to a blindside. I have witnessed several accidents here over the last few years. There needs to be a hump created to slow cars down. It’s a seriously dangerous bend and concerns me daily. There is currently nothing that deters cars going very fast and slamming the brakes on when cars coming the other way that they are blindsided. The flow of traffic has become greater over the years and cars seem to be going faster. It’s a matter of time before the is a fatal accident unless this is addressed soon
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Rosecroft Avenue, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
